newsitem.title: USA: RCN Telecom to resell local phone service.
newsitem.headline: RCN Telecom to resell local phone service.

text.p: RCN Telecom Services Inc of C-TEC Corp said Tuesday it had reached an agreement with a regional telephone company to resell its local service in various states.

RCN said it had signed an interconnection agreement with Bell Atlantic Corp to resell the service in the phone operator's territory in New Jersey, Pennsylvania, Maryland, Delaware, Virginia and the District of Columbia.
It did disclose the value of the deal and its officials were not immediately available for comment.
RCN, a video and telecommunications services company, became independent following the break up of C-TEC earlier this year.
